video_prompt: Female character turns head side to side, then raises and lowers her peace-sign hand. Her long green hair sways with each movement. The background subtly shifts from black to deep green.
image_prompt: Full body shot of a female character with long green hair, fair skin, and doll-like features, against a black background. She wears a layered green outfit: dark green vest with gold accents and lacing over a lighter green puffy-sleeved top with elbow cutouts and a white ruffled undershirt with black bows. She accessorizes with a wide-brimmed brown hat with a golden antler ornament, emerald green dangling earrings, and an emerald gemstone garter on her left thigh. She forms a peace sign with her left hand. She wears sturdy brown lace-up boots and detailed lacing on her right leg. Her gaze is neutral and directed at the viewer.
refined_video_prompt: Head pivots side-to-side. Long green hair dynamically sways with each turn. A peace-sign hand actively raises and lowers. The background subtly transitions from black to deep green.
